Class MainController

flores.firstproject.MainController

javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the main screen controller.

  • Method Details

    • onAddPart

      public void onAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes you to the add part window/form. This method takes you to the add part window/form which allows a new part to be added into the inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the add part button gets clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onAddProduct

      public void onAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes you to the add product window/form. This method takes you to the add product window/form which allows a new part to be added into the inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the add product button gets clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onSearchPart

      public void onSearchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method allows you to search for a part. This method will search and highlight a part in the parts inventory by inputting a part id in the text-field.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When a part ID is specified in the search text-field

    • onSearchProduct

      public void onSearchProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method allows you to search for a product. This method will search and highlight a product in the products inventory by inputting a product id in the text-field.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When a product ID is specified in the search text-field

    • onModifyPart

      public void onModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes you to the modify-part window/form. This method takes you to the modify-part window/form which allows a part to be modified in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the modify-part button gets clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeletePart

      public void onDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a part. This method will delete the part that is selected from the inventory
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the delete-part button gets clicked

    • onModifyProduct

      public void onModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method takes you to the modify-product window/form. This method takes you to the modify-product window/form which allows a product to be modified in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the modify-product button gets clicked
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeleteProduct

      public void onDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a product. This method will delete the product that is selected from the inventory
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the delete-product button gets clicked
